page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content:
The houses were built by the Harlow Development Corporation and have now been handed over to Harlow District Council. In Little Parndon there are four main types of housing:
{Terraced. Most houses are this type. {Flats. There are two blocks. {Houses. Mostly semi-detached. {Maisonettes. A few of these.
Most of the property is rented from the HDC. As Little Parndon was built about 30 years ago, there is a shortage of garages in the area as the present rate of car ownership had not been anticipated. Many cars have to be parked on the roads at night.
